name: coupon-shield
description: Detects Honey browser extension overlays for merchants.

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.bundle.json && esbuild dist/bundle-tmp/global.js --bundle --format=iife --platform=browser --target=es5 --outfile=dist/couponshield.js && esbuild dist/bundle-tmp/auto.js --bundle --format=iife --platform=browser --target=es5 --outfile=dist/auto.js
